channel.title: Zach's Monster Calculator!
channel.description:
Zach's Monster Calculator! V1.0!
This is where the user inputs the experience per monster themselves. I will eventually make a calculator, where all they have to enter is the name of the monster.
I don't know why you would leech it, but please don't. It's like 25 lines of coding..
Credits:
Zach 100%
V2.0 coming soon, as soon as i figure out an error I'm having.
http://up.ht/uYvBn6
Media:
[IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/Capture-3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/Capture1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/Capture3.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1182.photobucket.com/albums/x453/Ampzor2011/capture4.png[/img]
This was merely practice, so i can try and memorize the JOptionPane package and a backup just in case the original gets deleted.
v1.1
http://up.ht/uKZOqM
Full basic GUI
Credits: Zach 80% Random Tutorial : http://www.dreamincode.net/forums/topic/17705-basic-gui-concepts/

item.title: Zach's Monster Calculator!
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

imsuperman05:

Why release it? No point, just finish it.

Well, I have 2 days left until my activation is up on windows, and i reinstall it. I will be at my grandma’s all day for thanksgiving tomorrow. My flash drive is full, and i decided to just to post it on here so i could re-download it. I’m not the best with computers either, I have made like 4 of this little calculators, so i could rewrite it, but i guess i’m just lazy. Yes, 25 lines lazy. They have that.

Read full topic
